[et_pb_line_break_holder] --> //list of prices 6 butons - 4 columns<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --> var priceList = [<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --> [49, 69, 89, 109, "#032aa0"], <!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --> [69, 89, 109, 309, "#60463B"], <!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --> [69, 89, 109, 149, "#493B2A"], <!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --> [99, 149, 199, 149, "#474647"], <!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --> [99, 109, 149, 249, "#442B48"], <!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --> [149, 199, 249, 299, "#2F2504"] <!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --> ];<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --> <!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --> //init - first button is active<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --> $(".option-btn:first-child .et-pb-icon").addClass("price-active");<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --> <!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --> //changing active buttons<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --> $("#option-btns .option-btn").on("click", function(){<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --><!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --> //find which element is clicked<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --> var row = $("#option-btns .option-btn").index(this);<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --><!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --> // set button as active <!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --> $("#option-btns .price-active").removeClass("price-active");<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --> $(this).find(".et-pb-icon").addClass("price-active");<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --> <!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --> //changes prices on price list <!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --> $("#price-list-tables").find(".pricing-price").each(function(idx){<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --> $(this).html(priceList[row][idx]);<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --> });<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --><!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --> // get the last item of selected array<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --> var price_row = priceList[row];<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --> var activeColor = price_row[price_row.length-1]; <!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --> <!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --> <!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --> //changes backgrounds and borders according to clicked button (last parameter in priceList array)<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --> $(".price-list-title h2").css('color', activeColor);<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --> $(".price-list-price").css('background-color', activeColor);<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --> $(".price-list-btn").css('background-color', activeColor);<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --> $("#price-list-tables .et_pb_column").css('border-bottom-color', activeColor);<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --> <!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --> });<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --> <!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] -->});<!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --> <!-- [et_pb_line_break_holder] --></script>[/et_pb_code][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
